question:
Which among the following about the Moplah Rebellion are correct?
1. It was started in the year 1921
2. It was an anti Hindu movement
3. It was an anti Zamindar movement
4. It was an anti British movement
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation:
Moplahs are the Muslim peasant of the Malabar region. Moplah rebellion was started in the year 1921. It was an anti Hindu movement, anti Zamindar as well as anti British movement.
